title: Start
body:
<<move Aig StageLeft2>><<move Lee StageRight2>>
Lee: Aigburth, your singing has improved lately.
->Thanks!
    Aig: Oh, thanks!
    You beam with pride.
->I think it still needs work...
    Aig: I think it still needs work.
    Lee: That's a good attitude to have.
    Lee: But just make sure not to work yourself too hard.
    Aig: Okay!
->Really?
    Aig: Oh really?
    Lee: Don't fish for more compliments, Aiggy. It's not attractive.
